subject: Tennis
Sony Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: With a virtuoso performance, Novak Djokovic captured his fourth title in Key Biscayne and narrowed the gap in his long series with Rafael Nadal to 22-18.
snippet: With a virtuoso performance, Novak Djokovic captured his fourth title in Key Biscayne and narrowed the gap in his long series with Rafael Nadal to 22-18.
